name: part_002
file: tmp_【#冥ハロ2025】白上フブキ生誕３DLIVE「冥界Halloween Night!」【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [7Tm7dVsTPBk]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of 'Otherworld Concerto' performance by Shirakami Fubuki.
Narrative interlude with sketched illustrations depicting a circus story.
Performance of 'CIRCUS PANIC!!!' featuring Omaru Polka.

subtitles.original: 皆が指差し笑おうとも我は笑わない！
subtitles.english: Even if everyone points and laughs, I won't laugh!

subtitles.original: 我は笑わない
subtitles.english: I won't laugh.

subtitles.original: 正直に生きるお前が貶されて
subtitles.english: You, who live honestly, are disparaged,

subtitles.original: 嘘で生きる奴らが徳となる世界で
subtitles.english: In a world where those who live by lies profit,

subtitles.original: 我だけはお前の腕を離さない！
subtitles.english: I alone will not let go of your arm!

subtitles.original: 時を刻み忘れようとも我は離さない
subtitles.english: Even if time forgets to tick, I won't let go.

subtitles.original: 我は離さない！
subtitles.english: I won't let go!

subtitles.original: 我は忘れない！
subtitles.english: I won't forget!

subtitles.original: 身を粉にして働いても
subtitles.english: Even if you work yourself to the bone,

subtitles.original: 感謝されないことも... (シバシバ)
subtitles.english: And aren't thanked for it... (often).

subtitles.original: 自己犠牲を受け入れても
subtitles.english: Even if you accept self-sacrifice,

subtitles.original: 限界がもうやってくるから
subtitles.english: Your limit is already approaching,

subtitles.original: 自分を大事に愛せばいい
subtitles.english: So you should just cherish and love yourself.

subtitles.original: それは他人を愛すること
subtitles.english: That is what it truly means to love others.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 人は病んでゆく
subtitles.english: Ah, people fall into illness,

subtitles.original: 損なってゆく
subtitles.english: Losing themselves,

subtitles.original: 塵に戻ってゆく
subtitles.english: Returning to dust.

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 人は老いてゆく
subtitles.english: Ah, people grow old,

subtitles.original: 救われてゆく
subtitles.english: Being saved.

subtitles.original: 君に逢えたから...
subtitles.english: Because I met you...

subtitles.original: 君を愛したから...
subtitles.english: Because I loved you...

subtitles.original: 君が闘うなら...
subtitles.english: If you fight...

subtitles.original: 僕も闘うから...
subtitles.english: I will fight too...

subtitles.original: 我武者羅に生きるお前が笑われて
subtitles.english: You, living earnestly, are laughed at,

subtitles.original: 楽に生きる奴らが徳をする世界で
subtitles.english: In a world where those who live easy lives profit,

subtitles.original: 我だけはお前のことを笑わない！
subtitles.english: I alone will not laugh at you!

subtitles.original: 皆が指差し笑おうとも我は笑わない！
subtitles.english: Even if everyone points and laughs, I won't laugh!

subtitles.original: 正直に生きるお前が貶されて
subtitles.english: You, who live honestly, are disparaged,

subtitles.original: 嘘で生きる奴らが徳となる世界で
subtitles.english: In a world where those who live by lies profit,

subtitles.original: 我だけはお前の腕を離さない！
subtitles.english: I alone will not let go of your arm!

subtitles.original: 時を刻み忘れようとも我は離さない
subtitles.english: Even if time forgets to tick, I won't let go.

subtitles.original: 我は離さない！
subtitles.english: I won't let go!

subtitles.original: 我は忘れない！
subtitles.english: I won't forget!

subtitles.original: それじゃあ今夜は、この王国のお話をしていこう。
subtitles.english: Well then, tonight let's talk about this kingdom.

subtitles.original: 嘘か真か、
subtitles.english: Truth or lie,

subtitles.original: ここに記されている本は内容がコロコロと変わってしまう、不思議な本でね
subtitles.english: the book recorded here is a mysterious one whose contents change constantly.

subtitles.original: さて、今回はどんなお話になっているかな。
subtitles.english: Now, I wonder what kind of story it has become this time.

subtitles.original: これはあるサーカスの団が王国へ訪れ、
subtitles.english: This is a story about a circus troupe visiting a kingdom,

subtitles.original: まだ未熟な座長さんが、綺羅びやかなステージに包まれたお話
subtitles.english: and an immature ringmaster enveloped by a glittering stage.

subtitles.original: あぁ...これが私が望んだ夢のエンディング！
subtitles.english: Ah... this is the dream ending I wished for!

subtitles.original: さあ、今日も始まりました〜！
subtitles.english: Come on, it's started again today!

subtitles.original: 煌びやか、享楽のパレード
subtitles.english: A glittering, hedonistic parade.

subtitles.original: 常識もここじゃ無関係
subtitles.english: Common sense is irrelevant here.

subtitles.original: 踊れ歌え騒げ全て忘れて
subtitles.english: Dance, sing, make noise, forget everything!

subtitles.original: 細かいことは置いといて
subtitles.english: Put the little details aside,

subtitles.original: とりあえず身を任せてみな
subtitles.english: just give yourself over to it for now.

subtitles.original: 幸福を少し分けるような
subtitles.english: Like sharing a little bit of happiness...

subtitles.original: 饗宴 Show Time!
subtitles.english: A feast, Show Time!

subtitles.original: 積もりゆく不安や後悔
subtitles.english: Piling anxiety and regrets,

subtitles.original: 今だけはちょっと目を背けて
subtitles.english: turn your eyes away just for now.

subtitles.original: そのままじゃ楽しめないじゃん
subtitles.english: You can't enjoy it like that.

subtitles.original: この場だけは何もかもを忘れて！
subtitles.english: Forget absolutely everything just for this moment!

subtitles.original: 幾千の価値観全部
subtitles.english: All the thousands of values,

subtitles.original: 引っ括め楽しませてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll bundle them up and entertain you.

subtitles.original: 百鬼夜行もビックリの
subtitles.english: Surprising even the Night Parade of One Hundred Demons,

subtitles.original: 隊を成している
subtitles.english: forming a corps.

subtitles.original: 怪奇模した喜劇が幕開け
subtitles.english: A comedy mimicking the bizarre opens its curtains.

subtitles.original: 一目見ればたちまち虜に！
subtitles.english: One look and you'll be instantly captivated!

subtitles.original: どんな愛も受け入れてくれる
subtitles.english: It accepts any kind of love.

subtitles.original: ここだけはあなたの理想郷
subtitles.english: This place alone is your utopia.

subtitles.original: もう間もなく主役の登場、
subtitles.english: The main act will appear very soon,

subtitles.original: 一時でも目を離さないで！
subtitles.english: don't take your eyes off even for a moment!

subtitles.original: 眩しいほどのステージが始まる
subtitles.english: A dazzling stage is about to begin.

subtitles.original: 想像して
subtitles.english: Imagine,

subtitles.original: 華々しいスポットライトの中
subtitles.english: in the brilliant spotlight,

subtitles.original: 目を奪うような妙技の数々
subtitles.english: numerous feats that steal your eyes.

subtitles.original: この空間が世界で一番
subtitles.english: This space is the number one in the world,

subtitles.original: 娯楽の名に相応しいんだ！
subtitles.english: worthy of the name of entertainment!

subtitles.original: 割れんばかりの歓声と拍手で
subtitles.english: With cheers and applause that could crack the air,

subtitles.original: ショーは回っていく
subtitles.english: the show goes on.

subtitles.original: まあ、これはあくまで理想の話なんですが
subtitles.english: Well, this is just an ideal story, though.
